name: CheckboxGroup
description: Provides a shared state to a series of checkboxes.

allValues.description: All values of the checkboxes in the group.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

defaultValue.description: The default checked values of the checkbox group. Use when uncontrolled.

disabled.description: Whether the component should ignore user actions.

onValueChange.description:
A callback function that is called when the value of the checkbox group changes.
Use when controlled.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

value.description: The currently checked values of the checkbox group. Use when controlled.

data-disabled.description: Present when the checkbox group is disabled.
